entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
